English: to be exposed to the coronavirus
to stop, prevent (the spreading of the virus)
to slow the spread of the virus
to have to be admitted to the hospital
to declare a state of emergency
to die (of the virus, of corona)
to belong to a risk group
to spread (in Finland, through the air)
to spread (to Europe, around the world)
to force, oblige (to use a mask)
Wash your hands with water and soap.
Don't touch your face all the time!
Use a mask on public transportation!
Don't go to school if you have symptoms!
Please don't come to the barber's sick!
It's a good idea to work from home.
It's a good idea to stay home.
It's a good idea to avoid close contact.
The virus spreads / is spreading quickly.
I don't want to get infected.
I don't want to infect others.
I want to protect family members.
The whole of Finland is closed.
The virus is transmitted from person to person.

Finnish: Minulla on ollut vain lieviä oireita.

English: Staff have been exposed to the coronavirus.
Hungarian: A személyzet ki volt téve a koronavírusnak.

English: I was diagnosed with a coronavirus infection.
He's been diagnosed with a corona infection.
The result of the corona test was negative.
Someone in my family belongs to a risk group.
Hungarian: Valaki a családomban veszélyeztetett csoporthoz tartozik.

English: How can the spreading of the virus be slowed down?
Hungarian: Hogyan lehet lassítani a vírus terjedését?

English: They're trying to slow down the spread of the virus.

Finnish: Maskin on peitettävä nenä ja suu.
English: The mask must cover the nose and mouth.
Hungarian: A maszknak az orrot és a szájat fednie kell.

English: A mask reduces the spread of microbes to others.
Hungarian: A maszk csökkenti a mikrobák terjedését másokra.

English: The use of a mask is recommended.
Use of a mask has become obligatory in the country.
Let's start using face masks on buses.
Hungarian: Kezdjünk el maszkot használni a buszokon.

English: Recovery from the disease can take months.
Hungarian: A betegségből való felépülés hónapokig tarthat.

English: One can be sick at home if the infection is mild.
Hungarian: Enyhe COVID-ot otthon is lehet kezelni.

English: He was ill with corona without knowing.
The epidemic may still take a long time.
Hungarian: A járvány még hosszú ideig tarthat.
Az oltás védelméhez két oltás szükséges.

English: The number of COVID cases is increasing.
The number of cases is increasing.
30 new corona infections have been found there.
30 new corona infections have been confirmed there.
30 new corona infections have been reported there.
30 new corona infections have been registered there.
30 people died from the coronavirus there.
Hungarian: Ott 30 ember halt meg a koronavírus miatt.

English: The total number of infections is now 70 000.

Finnish: Tautiin on kuollut satoja tuhansia ihmisiä.
English: Hundreds of thousands of people have died of the disease.
Hungarian: A betegségben több százezer ember halt meg.

English: There are 116 people in hospital care right now.
Hungarian: Jelenleg 116 ember van kórházi kezelés alatt.

English: Many people have died of the virus.
Hungarian: Sok ember halt meg a vírus miatt.

English: The corona situation is escalating “tightening” again.
The corona situation has escalated “tightened” again.
People are circumventing the quarantine recommendation.
Hungarian: Az emberek kijátsszák a karantén ajánlást.

English: Gatherings of more than 10 people are prohibited.
Many countries have closed their borders.
The borders are being kept shut.
Passengers are directed to corona tests.
Some of the passengers refused the test.
The majority of those infected have recovered.
